title: SnapSupport
description:
SnapSupport is a mobile customer support platform. With SnapSupport app, customers can ask questions with pictures or video in seconds. Take a picture of the issue, annotate the image and send to support team. Support team can respond to customer issues in seconds or minutes using a messaging interface.

- Picture and video questions
- Draw on images and add annotation
- Real-time messaging interface
- Customer support team collaboration
- Live video call
- Web app for customers and support team
descriptionHTML:
SnapSupport is a mobile customer support platform. With SnapSupport app, customers can ask questions with pictures or video in seconds. Take a picture of the issue, annotate the image and send to support team. Support team can respond to customer issues in seconds or minutes using a messaging interface.

- Picture and video questions
- Draw on images and add annotation
- Real-time messaging interface
- Customer support team collaboration
- Live video call
- Web app for customers and support team
summary: SnapSupport is a picture and video based mobile customer support platform.
summaryHTML: SnapSupport is a picture and video based mobile customer support platform.
comments: Did all paperworks saved in draft ,checked after few time it won't be there ... Eveytime need to do same things twice if you rely on this app...
I used S10+ and now S21. It takes a lot of time to upload photos. It used to work In a second before but not it takes a lot of time.
Worst App in the world, with full of bugs and designed totally not for field work, automatically delete data, very bad response time, worst photo uploading function.
worked better now with the update. pdf export is also handy.
I can't upload the original photos in snapper support. Anyone has same problem?
This is the worst app I've ever used.
Amazing product to connect geographically dispersed field service teams with technical experts of the company to solve customer issues faster and cheaper.
Works well but have receiving issues with loading chat
